name: The distancing game
description:
The game:

The game is simple - avoid any contact with other people.

Made for Trijam 68. This one took me about 3 hours and 3 minutes (technical issues when recording the OST).

Known bugs:
  • I forgot to display the score during the game, it only shows at the end.
  • Soundtrack doesn't loop :(
  • Business man can end in the same tile as player, breaking the game. Reload the page if this happens.
Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move. Mouse to click buttons.

Features:
  • More than one type of enemy.
  • Simple gameplay.
  • Original graphics, sounds, music.
Credits:

Everything is made by me using Godot engine, Aseprite and Ableton Live.
